sentences.sContent: A mix of live action and CG animation, the story starts in the Middle Ages, when the maladroit sorcerer Gargamel (Hank Azaria) finally discovers the location of Smurf Village.
sentences.sContent_eng: A mix of live action and CG animation, the story starts in the Middle Ages, when the maladroit sorcerer Gargamel (Hank Azaria) finally discovers the location of Smurf Village.
sentences.sCn: 混合真人实景和计算机绘图动画，这个起源于中世纪的故事，笨拙的巫师格格巫（汉克 阿扎利亚）最终发现了蓝精灵村的所在地。

synos.tran: 笨拙的；不灵巧的；愚钝的

trans.tranOther: not clever or sensitive in the way you deal with people
